fields.description: If omitted, the default value is Requeue.
fields.name: NodeDeallocationOption

fields.description: The default value is 15 minutes. Timeout values use ISO 8601 format. For example, use PT10M for 10 minutes. The minimum value is 5 minutes. If you specify a value less than 5 minutes, the Batch service rejects the request with an error; if you are calling the REST API directly, the HTTP status code is 400 (Bad Request).
fields.name: ResizeTimeout

fields.description: At least one of targetDedicatedNodes, targetLowPriorityNodes must be set.
fields.name: TargetDedicatedNodes

fields.description: At least one of targetDedicatedNodes, targetLowPriorityNodes must be set.
fields.name: TargetLowPriorityNodes
